name: Mueller Water Products, Inc.
description: Mueller Water Products, Inc. is a leading manufacturer and distributor of products and services for water and gas distribution systems. Founded in 1857 and headquartered in Atlanta, Georgia, Mueller has established itself as a trusted provider of water infrastructure solutions, including valves, hydrants, and metering products. The company is dedicated to delivering innovative technologies and solutions that enhance the efficiency and reliability of water distribution systems. Mueller serves a diverse range of customers including municipalities, utilities, and contractors, ensuring safe and sustainable water delivery for communities across America. With a strong commitment to quality and service, Mueller continually invests in research and development to advance its product offerings, including smart water technologies that enable real-time monitoring and control of water systems. The company's mission is to provide superior products and services that help customers manage their water resources effectively and sustainably. Mueller Water Products is also committed to environmental stewardship, focusing on sustainability in its operations and product development.
